extensions.name: ipedrazas.kubernetes-snippets
extensions.description: Provides a collection of code snippets for Kubernetes resources, making it easier to write Kubernetes configuration files

extensions.name: mindaro.mindaro
extensions.description: Enables developers to run and debug their applications directly in Kubernetes clusters from VS Code, simplifying microservices development and testing

extensions.name: ms-azuretools.vscode-docker
extensions.description: Makes it easy to build, manage, and deploy containerized applications from Visual Studio Code using Docker

extensions.name: ms-kubernetes-tools.vscode-aks-tools
extensions.description: Provides integration with Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS), allowing users to browse AKS clusters and manage AKS resources within VS Code

extensions.name: ms-kubernetes-tools.vscode-kubernetes-tools
extensions.description: Offers comprehensive Kubernetes integration, including cluster management, resource navigation, logs streaming, and terminal access to Kubernetes environments

extensions.name: ms-vscode-remote.remote-containers
extensions.description: Allows you to open any folder inside (or mounted into) a container and take advantage of VS Code's full feature set as if you were working locally
